dialog-notice-wikilambda: WikiLambda app a halin yanzu yana nuna sabon bita ne kawai. Duba [[phab:T397902|tikitin]] akan Phabricator.
settings-saved:
An adana saitunan cikin nasara.
Sake shigar da shafin don amfani da su.
settings-show-link-help: Nuna maɓallin aiki (❖) bayan hanyar haɗin don buɗe maganganun Instant Diffs. In ba haka ba, ana ƙara aikin danna kai tsaye zuwa mahaɗin. Har yanzu kuna iya buɗe hanyar haɗin yanar gizon ta latsa Alt + Danna.
settings-show-page-link-help: Yana nuna maɓallin aiki (➔) bayan hanyar haɗin don kewaya zuwa shafi da sashin da aka gyara. Idan an shigar da rubutun [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Convenient Discussions|Tattaunawa masu dacewa]], maɓallin zai kuma yi ƙoƙarin kewayawa zuwa sharhin da ya dace.
settings-mark-watched-line: Alama yana canzawa kamar yadda aka ziyarta a cikin Lissafin Kallon lokacin da aka buɗe maganganun Nan take daga mahaɗin da ke da alaƙa.
settings-unhide-diffs-help: Ana buƙatar " $1 " [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:RevisionDelete|Haƙƙin mai amfani]] don duba abun ciki na bita.
settings-links-format-full: Cikakken url tare da taken shafi
settings-wikilinks-format-link: Hanya mai sauƙi a cikin maɓalli
settings-enable-hotkeys: Kunna gajerun hanyoyin madannai a cikin maganganun Instant Diffs.
settings-show-menu-icons: Nuna gumaka a cikin menu na zazzagewar maganganu na Instant Diffs.
settings-notify-errors: Nuna faɗakarwar bugu don kurakurai masu mahimmanci.
error-server: Kuskuren uwar garken, da fatan za a sake gwadawa daga baya
error-offline: Da fatan za a duba haɗin intanet ɗin ku
error-wasted: Kuskuren da ba a zata ba
error-prepare-mobile: An kashe rubutun a cikin saitunan fata ta hannu (Minerva)
error-dependencies-curid: An kasa loda abubuwan dogaron shafi "curid= $1 ": $4
error-setting-request: An kasa loda zaɓuɓɓukan mai amfani: $4
